content.question: What will happen to the price and quantity of footballs as a result of an increase in the price of leather used to make footballs?

choices.label: Price will increase, and quantity will increase.
Price will increase, and quantity will decrease.
Price will decrease, and quantity will increase.
Price will decrease, and quantity will decrease.
Price will not change, and quantity will not change.

content.answer: Price will increase, and quantity will decrease.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
